tool.name: GATK 4 (Docker)
tool.description: Genome Analysis Toolkit 4 in a Docker container

param.name: input_bam
param.label: Input BAM file
param.help: Select the BAM file to analyze

param.name: emit_ref_confidence
param.label: Reference confidence mode
param.help: Select the mode for emitting reference confidence scores

param.name: max_alternate_alleles
param.label: Maximum alternate alleles
param.help: Select the maximum number of alternate alleles to genotype

param.name: min_base_quality_score
param.label: Minimum base quality
param.help: Minimum base quality required to consider a base for calling

tool.help:
**GATK 4 (Docker)** docker pull seedgeorge/gatk4_and_bwa0.7.17_arm64 for ARM64 or broadinstitute/gatk:4.1.3.0 for AMD/Intel x86_64
This tool runs the Genome Analysis Toolkit (GATK) 4 in a Docker container.
For more information, consult the GATK documentation: https://gatk.broadinstitute.org/hc/en-us
